name: 123Queue -Tap into your brain
description:
Just tap to pick a multiple of 2!

"123Queue" is simple and addictive game that requires agility and a quick bit of mental arithmetic.

Maybe it is also good for brain training :)

NOW, PASS or PICK!

== Why do many people love this game ==

- FREE to play: We also naver require in-app purchase.

- 60 TIME ATTACK MODE: Try your best to tap multiply numbers as much as you can in 60 seconds, and don't mistake.

- 100 CHALLENGE MODE: Tap multiply numbers to 100 as fast as you can, and don't mistake.

(More modes are coming soon)

- FRIEND RANKING, Social Share : Share to Friends a your high score with screenshot(Facebook, Twitter, Gamecenter, Etc.)

- UPGRADE Class : Get a class from bronze skull to prime crown.

- FAST-PACED User Interface

- FAST DOWNLOAD because it has low capacity

- ENJOY GAME MUSIC

== How to play? ==

Just pick out multiple numbers on the dropped line.

Tap Right : Multiply Number

Tap Left : PASS

Ready to tap number tiles? One, Two, Three Q!

Like us on facebook or follow us on twitter for the latest news:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/123queue

Twitter: @123Queue or https://twitter.com/123Queue

Having any problems? Any suggestions? we would love to hear from you!

Support: help@kingkonggames.co.kr
